value.title: Frontier Tower SF
value.description:
About Event
​We’re entering an era where the foundations of value are shifting.

AI can generate anything, compute is becoming abundant, and synthetic media is indistinguishable from reality.

​In that world, the things that become valuable aren’t the same things civilizations valued before.

​This event brings together quantum researchers, cryptographers, builders, and engineers to explore a (not so) simple question:

​What does money look like in a world where humanness, provenance, privacy, c
